The original post attributes the failure to get the job to a general lack of success in the person's career, whereas the transferred post attributes it to a specific event (not getting the job) and emphasizes the person's agency in seeking new opportunities and developing skills. This change in attributional style suggests a more optimistic outlook and a greater sense of control over one's life.
